name: Cleveland-Cliffs Inc.
description: Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. is the largest flat-rolled steel producer in North America and a major supplier of iron ore pellets. Founded in 1847 and headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, the company has a long history of innovation and leadership in the steel industry. Cleveland-Cliffs operates several steel mills and iron ore mines across the United States, focusing on producing high-quality steel products for various industries, including automotive, construction, and energy. The company emphasizes sustainability and environmental responsibility, with initiatives aimed at reducing emissions and optimizing resource use. In addition to steel production, Cleveland-Cliffs is committed to the development of advanced technologies in steelmaking and offers a wide range of steel solutions tailored to the needs of its customers. As a significant player in the global steel market, Cleveland-Cliffs has positioned itself to benefit from the growing demand for steel and ongoing infrastructure investments across North America.
